page.title: 15A CHILD'S VIEW OF FAMILY.
page.content: I live in a family of four.I used to live on an estate in a town but in 1982 we moved into the country here in Penton.It was a big change for me I found it very hard to fit in and most of all I was lonely.I used to go to my friends who lives one mile away,but she was working on the farm most of the time.Now I have got friends.I have started to go to Guides too. My brother starts school in September.I go to Comprehensive School then. I have a kitten and two cats.We have 15 doves,a racing pigeon,four hens and a cockerel.I am not lonely anymore! I come in from school at 15.45 and if it is a good day I hang the washing out.I go back inside and set the table.I play outside with my younger brother and feed the animals.I watch television,go for walks and enjoy reading.My Dad works in Carlisle.
